SELECT cd code, cd_korn_nm "value", cd id, cd_korn_nm text, up_cd, cd_group_sn, up_cd FROM TCM_INTG_CD
WHERE 1=1
AND cd_group_sn = #{cdGroupSn}
AND cd = #{schCd}
AND up_cd IS NULL
AND NVL(up_cd,'') = NVL(#{upCd},'') AND NVL(use_yn,'Y') = 'Y' AND del_yn = 'N'
ORDER BY cd_seq

WITH code_tree AS ( SELECT ic.cd FROM FTCORE.tcm_intg_cd ic WHERE ic.cd_group_sn = 16 AND ic.use_yn = 'Y' AND ic.del_yn = 'N' START WITH ic.cd =#{schUpNtnCd} CONNECT BY PRIOR ic.cd = ic.up_cd ) SELECT DISTINCT nc.ntn_no code, nc.ntn_nm text, nc.ntn_nm "value", nc.ntn_eng_nm, nc.ntn_cd, nc.cntnt_cd FROM FTCORE.tcm_ntn_cd nc JOIN code_tree ct ON nc.cntnt_cd = ct.cd WHERE nc.use_yn = 'Y' AND nc.del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY nc.cntnt_cd, nc.ntn_nm

SELECT nc.ntn_no code, nc.ntn_no id, nc.ntn_nm text, nc.ntn_nm "value", nc.ntn_eng_nm, nc.ntn_cd, nc.cntnt_cd FROM tcm_ntn_cd nc
WHERE nc.use_yn = 'Y' AND nc.del_yn = 'N'

SELECT oda_fld_cd code, oda_fld_cd id, fld_cd_nm "value", fld_cd_nm text, up_oda_fld_cd up_cd FROM tcm_biz_fld_cd
WHERE 1=1
AND NVL(up_oda_fld_cd,'') = NVL( #{upCd},'')
ORDER BY oda_fld_cd
SELECT inst_cd id, inst_cd code, inst_nm "value", inst_nm text FROM tcm_inst_cd WHERE use_yn='Y' ORDER BY inst_nm
